dmca.title: DMCA Notification of Claimed Infringement [05.0175]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Erik J. Heels [mailto:info@clocktowerlaw.com] 
Posted At: Friday, August 11, 2006 4:20 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA Notification of Claimed Infringement [05.0175]
Subject: DMCA Notification of Claimed Infringement [05.0175]
Importance: High


The Planet
Attn: George Poletes, Corporate Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207
Phone: 214-782-7800 x14771
Fax: 214-782-7756
Email: copyright@theplanet.com
Web: http://www.theplanet.com/legal/copyright.html

VIA EMAIL

Dear Mr. Poletes:

This is a follow-up to my phone message of today.

Our office represents BzzAgent, Inc. ("BzzAgent"), of Boston,
Massachusetts <http://www.bzzagent.com/>, in connection with its
intellectual property (e.g. patent and trademark) matters.  Our
representation can be verified at public records at the U.S. Patent and
Trademark Office (USPTO), such as for BzzAgent's BZZ trademark
<http://tarr.uspto.gov/servlet/tarr?regser=serial&entry=78258505>,
BZZAGENT trademark
<http://tarr.uspto.gov/servlet/tarr?regser=serial&entry=78632891>, and
[BEE LOGO] trademark
<http://tarr.uspto.gov/servlet/tarr?regser=serial&entry=78650755>.

BzzAgent is the owner of the content on its website(s)
<http://www.bzzagent.com/> <http://www.bzz.com/> and all related pages.
We recently learned that a website that your company is hosting contains
text, images, and trademarks ("material") owned by BzzAgent.  The
copying of this material is not authorized by BzzAgent, and thus
violates BzzAgent's copyright and trademark rights.  The site has copied
BzzAgent's material and is falsely promoting itself as an official
BzzAgent website.

The material in question appears at the following URL(s):

<http://www.bzzing.com/index.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/howitworks7.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/howitworks6.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/howitworks5.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/howitworks4.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/howitworks3.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/howitworks2.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/howitworks.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/WordOfMouth.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/WhyDoTheyBzz.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/WhoAreAgents.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/TermsConditions.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/Support.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/SampleReport.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/Reporting.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/PrivacyPolicy.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/Overview.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/Home.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/FAQs.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/ContactBzz.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/BzzOnBzz.php>
<http://www.bzzing.com/BeeLog.php>

We believe that you are hosting this site based on our search of ARIN's
WHOIS database <http://www.arin.net/whois/> of the IP address(s)
corresponding to the website in question (69.93.9.162).

We request that you immediately disable the material on this site, as
required by your policy <http://www.theplanet.com/legal/copyright.html>
and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), 17 U.S.C. section 512.

As required by the DMCA, I am providing you with the following
information:

1. Copyrighted Works.  BzzAgent owns the copyrighted and trademarked
[BEE LOGO] logo, the creative layout and design of the www.bzzagent.com
site, and the various text and images on the various BzzAgent pages at
www.bzzagent.com and related pages.

2. Infringing Material.  Unauthorized copies of the above currently
appear at www.bzzing.com (see URL(s) above).

3. Contact Information.  Please email me using this address or contact
me using the information provided in the signature below.

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the material noted above is
not authorized by BzzAgent, its agents, or the law.

5. I affirm that the statements I have made above are accurate, and are
made under penalty of perjury.

6. I affirm that I am authorized to act on behalf of BzzAgent, the
copyright owner of the material noted above.

I look forward to receiving your confirmation that you have disabled the
material at www.bzzing.com.

Sincerely,
/erikjheels/
Erik J. Heels
Attorney for BzzAgent
--
Clock Tower Law Group             Patent and Trademark Law
2 Clock Tower Place, Suite 255    Tel: 978-823-0008
Maynard, MA 01754-2545            Fax: 978-823-0888
http://www.clocktowerlaw.com      info@clocktowerlaw.com

NOTE: This message is not legal advice. No attorney-client relationship
has been formed as a result of this message.
